Students preparing for English language proficiency exams, such as TOEFL or IELTS or other language exams.
Individuals interested in leveraging cutting-edge technology for language learning.
Language enthusiasts looking for innovative ways to practice and improve their skills.

Individuals with limited access to English/or other-speaking environments who wish to practice their skills.
Non-native  speakers looking to improve their speaking, writing, listening, and grammar skills.
Individuals who want to learn English in a flexible, self-paced online course.
Students who enjoy interactive and engaging learning experiences using modern technology.
Anyone motivated to take their English or other  language proficiency to the next level with the help of ChatGPT.

courseDetails.title: How to Add Value in the Project Management Role
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unfollow some "Roles" and Follow some "Rules"
targetAudiences: Suitable for project managers who are handing projects for their organization.  PMs who feel they are not treated well in their organization in terms of the work responsibilitiess as well as the renumerations Not for people who are not managing or leading a project.  It will also not help PMP aspirants as we will not cover the theoritical terms and definitions from PMBOK guide. We will talk more about the practical aspects of project management
